data.title: Obituary for Mary A. (Davis) Neal
data.meta_description: Mary A. Neal | Passed away on Jan 11, 2020 | York Beach, Maine-Mary Alice (Davis) Neal, 80 passed... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Mary A. (Davis)  Neal | Lucas & Eaton Funeral Home
data.text:
York Beach, Maine-Mary Alice (Davis) Neal, 80 passed away peacefully Saturday, January 11th, 2020. Mary is survived by her sons, Sean Neal and wife Kim of York, ME and Dan Cryts of TN; step-daughter Lisa Marie Crowder of AZ; Mary's partner of 33 years Richard "Skip" Thompson; her beloved grandchildren Ashly M. Neal of Kittery, ME, Derek A. Neal of York, ME, Amber M. Malin, Crystal S. Cryts, Darrell L. Cryts and Shawn T. Cryts all of TN, Melina Krueger, Sophia Morrison, of AZ; 16 great-grandkids; a brother Holmer Davis of CO; a sister Barbara McCaslin-Cagle of CA; many nieces and nephews.

Mary is predeceased by her late husband Norman D. Neal and a son Mark A. Cryts.

Mary worked for 20 years at the York Sewer District before retiring in the late 90’s. “Nana Mary “was an avid sports enthusiast always up for an adventure to VT to watch Ashly play lacrosse and could often be seen and heard in the hockey rinks cheering Derek on!! In her later years she enjoyed listening to the “Elvis Presley” radio station with Sean and visiting with all his friends that would come by!

Calling hours will be held from 5 to 7pm on Friday, January 17th in the Lucas & Eaton Funeral Home, 91 Long Sands Rd., York, Maine. Memorial contributions may be made to a Veteran's charity of your choice. Visit www.lucaseatonfuneralhome.com
